name: part_005
file: tmp_【＃癒月ちょこ生誕祭2023】ちょこ先生はてぇてぇに囲まれたい【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [r8DrUubFFCQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the song where Subaru and Luna jokingly tackle Choco as a 'birthday present'.

subtitles.original:
女子校戦争
作詞 ゆう 作曲 samfree
subtitles.english:
High School Girl War
Lyrics: Yuu Composition: samfree

subtitles.original: チャイムのベルぎりぎりで
subtitles.english: Right at the chime of the bell

subtitles.original: ノーメイク別人の顔で
subtitles.english: With a no-makeup face of someone else

subtitles.original: すいませ すいませ すいませんね
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, so sorry

subtitles.original: まぶた重い
subtitles.english: My eyelids are heavy

subtitles.original: 教科書の隅に書いた
subtitles.english: Written in the corner of the textbook

subtitles.original: おくちに潜む魔物
subtitles.english: A monster lurking in my mouth

subtitles.original: すいませ すいませ 吸い込まれる
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, I'm being sucked in

subtitles.original: 片思い
subtitles.english: One-sided love

subtitles.original: 3限過ぎればだいたいみんな本気を出してガチ滅
subtitles.english: After the 3rd period, everyone usually gets serious and goes all out

subtitles.original: まじだるジャージがスカートから覗くそこは桃源郷
subtitles.english: Really tiring jerseys peeking from under skirts, that's Shangri-la

subtitles.original: 女子校戦争鳴り止まない 美しい花園なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: High school girl war won't stop ringing, it's not a beautiful flower garden

subtitles.original: みんな獲物狙っている テリトリー邪魔させない
subtitles.english: Everyone is eyeing their prey, won't let you interfere with my territory

subtitles.original: 女子校戦争負けられない あのイケメン教師落としたい
subtitles.english: High school girl war, I can't lose, I want to seduce that handsome teacher

subtitles.original: 制服脱ぎもほどいたらな カウントダウン始まるわ
subtitles.english: Once I've loosened my uniform, the countdown begins

subtitles.original: 期末テストぎりぎりで
subtitles.english: Right at the end of the final exams

subtitles.original: 意味なく手を上げアピール
subtitles.english: Pointlessly raising my hand to appeal

subtitles.original: すいませ すいませ すいませんね
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, so sorry

subtitles.original: 上目遣い
subtitles.english: Looking up with puppy eyes

subtitles.original: 教室の隅に寄せた
subtitles.english: Pushed to the corner of the classroom

subtitles.original: 補習に潜む魔物
subtitles.english: A monster lurking in the supplementary lessons

subtitles.original: すいませ すいませ 吸い込まれる
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, I'm being sucked in

subtitles.original: 子供扱い
subtitles.english: Being treated like a child

subtitles.original: 数学・物理の時だけ本気を出して含める
subtitles.english: I only get serious during math and physics

subtitles.original: まじだる仮病使い呼び出し口実そこは桃源郷
subtitles.english: Really tiring faking illnesses to get called out, that's Shangri-la

subtitles.original: 女子校戦争鳴り止まない 麗しい花園なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: High school girl war won't stop ringing, it's not a lovely flower garden

subtitles.original: みんな火花を散らしている 抜け駆けは許されない
subtitles.english: Everyone is flying sparks, no one is allowed to get ahead

subtitles.original: 女子校戦争負けられない あのあざとい女子を蹴落としたい
subtitles.english: High school girl war, I can't lose, I want to kick down that devious girl

subtitles.original: 制服のボタン外したらな カウントダウン始まるわ
subtitles.english: Once I've undone my uniform button, the countdown begins

subtitles.original: ねえ 先生 教えて
subtitles.english: Hey, teacher, tell me

subtitles.original: 方程式が解けないの
subtitles.english: I can't solve the equation

subtitles.original: ねえ 先生 助けて
subtitles.english: Hey, teacher, help me

subtitles.original: あたし熱があるみたい
subtitles.english: It seems I have a fever

subtitles.original: 女子校戦争鳴り止まない 美しい花園なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: High school girl war won't stop ringing, it's not a beautiful flower garden

subtitles.original: みんな獲物狙っている テリトリー邪魔させない
subtitles.english: Everyone is eyeing their prey, won't let you interfere with my territory

subtitles.original: 女子校戦争負けられない あのイケメン教師落としたい
subtitles.english: High school girl war, I can't lose, I want to seduce that handsome teacher

subtitles.original: 制服の裾めくったらら 子供扱いさせないわ
subtitles.english: Once I've flipped up the hem of my uniform, I won't let you treat me like a child

subtitles.original: 女子校～！
subtitles.english: High school girls~!

subtitles.original: 戦争～！
subtitles.english: War~!

subtitles.original: お疲れ様でした～！
subtitles.english: Thank you for the hard work~!

subtitles.original: じゃあね、今日はね
subtitles.english: Well then, today...

subtitles.original: 何？何？何？
subtitles.english: What? What? What?

subtitles.original: お誕生日ということで、ルーナさん
subtitles.english: Since it's your birthday, Luna-san...

subtitles.original: ちょっとプレゼントをあげますか
subtitles.english: Shall we give you a little present?

subtitles.original: プレゼント！
subtitles.english: A present!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生、どんなものが欲しいなら？
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei, what kind of thing do you want?

subtitles.original: えっ、チョコ先生、全力で
subtitles.english: Eh, Choco-sensei, with all my might...

subtitles.original: プレゼント、どうぞー！
subtitles.english: Here's your present!

subtitles.original: 違う違う！そんな強くない、そんな強くない！
subtitles.english: No, no! Not that strong, not that strong!

subtitles.original: 行け行け行け！
subtitles.english: Go go go!

subtitles.original: 怖い怖い怖い！
subtitles.english: Scary scary scary!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生！
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei!

subtitles.original: スバルのものなのらー！
subtitles.english: She's Subaru's!

subtitles.original: 全然強くない！全然強くない！
subtitles.english: Not strong at all! Not strong at all!

subtitles.original: 抜け駆けは許されないのら！
subtitles.english: No getting ahead!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生、今日誕生、今日誕生...
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei, today's birthday, today's birthday...

subtitles.original: チョコ先生！
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生、退治！退治！
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei, exterminate! Exterminate!
